name: Norvina Pro Pigment Palette Vol. 1 for Face & Body
about: What it is:A professional-grade artistry palette featuring 25 deluxe-size, high-performance shades with maximum payoff, curated by Norvina herself..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and phthalates. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:Norvina Pro Pigment contains 25 highly-pigmented, iconic colors, daring brights, and vibrant, professional pigments in oversize pans to offer limitless possibilities. Itu2019s perfect for the artist who wants to have the ultimate color collection and for the makeup fanatic who is ready to take their makeup creativity to the next level..This Palette Contains:

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Little pressure is needed when picking up product..-Apply light shades to highlight and accentuate features..-Apply medium shades to contour and transition color for a blended finish. .-Apply deeper shades to define and line..-Use a fluffy brush to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a christmas gift. I already had the volume 3 palette, so I was familiar with the ABH formula but honestly the vibrancy and opacity of the purple shades in this palette blew me away. I'm not the first person to use purple eyeshadow because most of the purples I've tried just haven't done it for me. But on the eyes they're stunning. I've also tried the burgundy and gold shades in the palette, and I absolutely love them. VERY pigmented and they blend like a dream, I barely had to touch my eyelid with the brush and it was blending. Someone who wants to experiment with color, splurge on a nice palette, or just try a beautiful eyeshadow formula will love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Colors are absolutely beautiful, this palette is quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful palette! I've actually never used a palette before, and found this very useful for some lovely stage makeup.  I was able to use different colors for shadow, liner & brow shaping.

reviews.review_title: refer to the how to use guide it will work out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: received this palette in my boxycharm premium and I had already bought the vol 5 palette so I decided  to try out the shades in each palette that looked similar and both worked nice I did notice the vol 5 was easier to work with.. Though this palette works beautifully I used elf eye primer and went by the how to use guide on here and had no issue with the shades also didn't have to wet my brush or put concealer on my lids for the shimmers to work ... so anyone that is new to pressed pigments or don't know how to use them just go by the guide and watch some good tutorials about pressed pigments and you shouldn't have any issue with any of these norvina palettes... I am not a pro I just did my research before paying an arm and leg for these

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most beautiful eyeshadow palettes I have ever owned! The colors included are amazing, highly pigmented and variated, enabling me to create many looks from one palette. I also love the outside case which is covered in black, and gold all over a beautiful purple

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this palette so much! Even the random blue and red shades work with the rest of the palette!   I got all the Norvina pro palettes after I stopped using JSC and the pigmentation is huge, but it's also easy to pick up a small bit and build up... an amazing line of pro palettes in prettymuch every colour throughout all the palettes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The quality is impeccable as far as color payoff but I have to say that a lot of the colors are just too outlandish and too bizarre for my taste but I got it for less than half price, so I canu2019t complain too much. If youu2019re not used to pro pigment eyeshadow I could see these posing a problem for beginners and makeup novices, because you will spend a great deal of time blending as the colors go on heavy unless you use just the slightest tap onto the pans. Is it worth $60? For me, not this particular pallet because of the neon pink and orange, bright red and yellowu2026itu2019s just too much overkill for everyday wear for a woman in her late 40u2019s. As I stated, I paid less than half price, so I feel that this particular pallet was worth the $, but certainly not worth $$$. I would certainly consider paying full price for a Norvina pallet with a different color story more suited to my personal taste, as the quality is the best that Iu2019ve experienced so far next to Natasha Denona and ViseArt. *You will need an oil based cleanser to remove these colors to avoid staining your eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried about these after not liking the smaller Norvina palettes but I really enjoy the quality of these. They are easy to blend and very pigmented all the shades I've used have been true to pan. The shimmers are a drier formula but give a beautiful impact on the eye they remind me of the shimmers in the regular abh palettes. The formula for the matte shades does feel different than the regular abh palettes, but I have the use it more to properly articulate the difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by the whole Norvina line! Every time I am wearing a colorful eyeshadow look itu2019s one of these palettes. So pigmented and last all day. One complaint- They are basically online only, Sephora needs to put these back in all the stores and make them permanent because in store there are no palettes like these, everything is all neutrals or bronze. For the fun and colorful palettes you have to get them online which makes them harder to sell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love all of the colors in this palette!! They all blend really well and are very pigmented. The only complaint I have is there isnu2019t really a great transition shade so I feel like I have to pull out another palette sometimes to create a look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous palette!! The colors are stunning and the quality of the shadows are impeccable! Highly recommend this palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Havenu2019t tried every color but the ones I have are just as good as my other pallets from them, bright, smooth and easy to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far, the single best palette Iu2019ve purchased to date. Pigments are bold with next to zero fallout and stay on clean and vibrant all day! I came in it for all of the purples and have been sold by nearly every pan. The combinations are endless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great palette! Wore the shadows without a primer today and still no creases. The pigment is great, you donu2019t need to do too much for it to look great. The palette itself is pretty heave with a great full mirror and the product came unharmed. Totally recommend for people who enjoy looking like a bad bleep :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a beautiful pallet but the purple hues stained and irritated my eyelids. I found the formula hard to blend. I really wanted to love this but it doesnu2019t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You can never go wrong with a Norvina Pro Palette. Buying this one started an addiction! Color pay off is amazing and the formula is so smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this palette way more than I expected to! I absolutely love the colors, the pinks and purples are so vibrant. I was really scared of putting purples in my eyes because every time I did I got a muddy look. But the more I played with this palette, the more confident I got in being able to do so. The more I got comfortable using it, the better my eyeshadow looks came out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors of this palette I bought the purple and the orange palette and use both but this was the first time using the bright pink and it blended okay but not the best and after I got my full eye done and put my eyeliner on it started to burn I just thought it would go away and so I left it and when I got home later that day and took my makeup off it stained my eyes so bad I looked like I still had pink all over my eyelids and it has a spot on my lid that hurts to the touch... I still love the palette hopefully it was just a one time thing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought all of the Norvina Pro Pigment palettes except the 4th large one and theyu2019re my favorite palettes. I collect eyeshadow palettes because itu2019s my favorite part of my makeup. These are so pigmented and they blend out beautifully. They were quite expensive as a collection, but I have no regrets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing palette , that makes you sit an hour thinking which look shall you do. Could create more than 10+ looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: not sure how this has so many good reviews, but im starting to think maybe i just got a bad batch. this is probably the worst pallete I've ever used. the shadows are very pigmented but they blend horribly. it's a struggle to get a nice blend using this pallete. I've gotten some decent looks out of the pallete but it's insanely difficult to use and i probably won't reach for this ever bc i have shadows that are just as pigmented and much easier to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The photo is this palette doesn't do it justice. This one is soooooo pretty. I haven't used many of the colors but I especially love the white and the purples.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful palette, but you have to pack on a lot of color. Staining is very predominant with the red colors. The black is more grayish if anything, but the white is the best white iu2019ve ever used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the pigments in this palette but once you start to blend the color fades also have a lot of fallout :( still a nice palette

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is great. At first I was on the fence, but once I dove into it I fell in love. The colors are vibrant and highly pigmented, but I don't experience a lot of fallout. The colors pack a punch though. So go in easy and be ready to BLEND. Even the glitters are highly impactful! The entire palette is super versatile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg where to start with this.. Upon initial impressions, I was super disappointed smh now that I've played with it a little more, I really enjoy it. At first, I was super excited and came right home and busted it open and started.playing with it, but things didn't go as planned, to say the least lol the colors literally blended right off my lids!! Colors also got muddy. Blue turned black!!! Omg! I was so upset! I was upset there was a learning curve becasue I just wanted to play lol basically you need a freshly cleaned face and eyes otherwise its alllll bad lol. Was getting ready today and pulled it out for a last stitch effort and when I tell you this is superrr pigmented and blends so well. Really.love this palette. FYI... if ur eyelids aren't feshly clean, the blue will turn black as it mixes with the oils from ur lids and the other colors will turn muddy, even if you have an eyelid primer on! Other than that, these colors are beautiful, very vibrant and bright. They show up on ur lids like the colors in the pan, which is very exciting for me!! The blue is my fave color! Its so hard to get that color right and they seriously nailed it! It's also a very well rounded palette with that black and white in there. Super impressed and super worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this palette! great shade range, amazing pigment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Minimal fall out and the pigment is amazing! Blends beautifully also! I was hesitant on buying this because I donu2019t usually wear anything colourful other than my neutrals but Iu2019m glad I splurged and purchased this palette. Definitely one of my top favourite palettes! You can create summer looks and fall looks with the colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing pigment, formula and colour pay off! The only things I would recommend are an eyeshadow primer, and doing your base after the shadows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The pigmentation in this palette is amazing! The colors donu2019t swatch on the arm well all the time but they go on the eyes beautifully! A lot of the pinkish tones stain the eyes but it doesnu2019t bother me and is expected from makeup :)! Highly recommend for a starter or if you want a palette in this collection and you like more pink/purple looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Than this is the pallette for you. I bought this pallette on a whim. The pigmentation is on par with ABH products and will last you all day. It blends beautifully. You will notice some dust on your pallette during application, but a worthy trade off for such great color. The shimmer and glitter actually has color in it which was a surprising treat.  I was not expecting so many purple colors, in colors so close to each other. But that was my own fault as it is clearly shown in the photos. That is really my only problem with the product. Oh and the navy blue has glitter in it.

reviews.review_title: THE PINKS IN HERE ARE AMAZING

reviews.review_text: I picked this up on sale and have no regrets. Some staining from some shades, but very pigmented and easy to work with. I haven't used all the colors yet but Ive used about 1/3 and no issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very pigmented and beautiful! Colors go on easy and blend easily as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is so much fun ! The colors are very pigmented and very easy to blend. There is little fall out within the pan and during application. If you love purple hues this palette is definitely for you !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is so much fun! The colors are so vibrant and bold, which is definitely a trait of the Norvina line that Iu2019m totally here for. However, where this palette really shines is when it comes to the formula. Itu2019s flawless. Minimal fallout, professional blend-a-bility, and incredible payoff. If youu2019re looking for a colorful addition to your collection- this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this palette as a gift from my boyfriend. It arrived on the mail. I was shocked that it didnu2019t come in broken on the mail because it didnu2019t come in with bubble wrap. It came in with brown paper. Itu2019s small enough to put it in my bag. When I first saw it I was surprised. The colors are great you can do your blush on the go without a big bulky blush palette. It contains colors that can be used for your eyes and cheeks. It comes with purple eyeshadow which is a plus because itu2019s my favorite color and it matches my eyes to use that shadow on my eyes. The packaging is beautiful. The case of the eyeshadow is made of plastic and not cardboard compared to the other Anastasia Beverly Hills eyeshadow containers. This beautiful eyeshadow palette is going to last for a long time. I want the volume 1 eyeshadow palette that contains 25 colors now. Hopefully I will get it soon.

reviews.review_text: This is a stunning palette! With so many different color options you can create so many different looks! Versatile is a word that definitely comes to mind. The mattes are smooth, pigmented and blend out nicely. The shimmers are beautiful and add a great sparkle to the eye. The shade A1 could have been a little more impactful in my opinion. I was counting on it to be a good inner corner shade but it is a little lackluster. But every other shimmer performs well. Overall, this is an excellent palette! The price tag may seem high but for how much product you get and how many different colors options there are, this is a great deal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love all 3 of the pro pigment palettes (I tend to have a mild makeup obsession). The pigment of these colors is stunning little fallout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this palette so much! Be aware that these are pigments and will stain your eyelids - also, some of them are not meant to be used around your eyes, which is common with pigments. That being said, I have had no issues with irritation. This palette is stunning and I love the colors offered in this palette. I am tan skinned and every shade that I've used has great color payoff on me. The colors blend beautifully and build up SO nicely. If you've been eyeing it, try it out!!!

reviews.review_title: Bold and beautiful/ cons pinks and purples stain
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Colors are beautiful and show up well. I bought this palette for the fun colors and I was impressed. Thereu2019s so many different looks you can do with it but no transition colors. Even so there are some dark, neutral/reds and a black for other looks and the shimmers are great.   Iu2019m new to this, so I was unaware that pinks and purples can stain your eyelids. I tried taking it off using a few different products over a period of time and by the next evening (Over 24 hours) they were back to normal. Just plan on using eyeshadow the next day that can cover them.   This palette is huge and the eyeshadow tins are big, so you really get a lot of product for your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow hello pigment! The colors work beautifully together. They blend like a dream. I'm really enjoying playing with all the different colors. FYI make sure to lay down I thick primer/ base because it will stain your eyes since these are pressed pigments.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this palette! The great range of colors makes ot possible to do more subtle looks and full on glam looks, super polyvalent! The shadows are smooth and buttery, easly blendable. The shimmers are great too, easy to apply with a brush and very buildable. I can't wait to purchase her 2 sisters.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This pallatte has all of the five things I look for. Pigmentation- Texture- Long lasting- No fall out- Beautiful color story. Starting with the pigmentation, I love when I get major color payoff with very little effort. I don't always have the time to layer or slowly buildup color. I love it when I find something that's going to be able to give me huge color pay off and fast like this one. I'm very dark skinned so it's hard sometimes to find a pallatte with colors that show on my skin. I never have that issue with Anastasia. The texture is creamy and easy to blend out. The colors are long lasting even when I rub my eye a little without realizing it. I can go out right after work and my eyeshadow still looks flawless. Even when I put my foundation on before eyeshadow I don't experience fallout and I know I can reach for this one without concern of ruining my foundation. The color story is beautiful and versatile, it's a mixture of colors and earth tones. Its perfect for everyday looks and you can create glamorous looks with this palette as well. It also works in the fall as well as the spring and winter so it's very versatile. You can create a range of different looks with this one pallatte. I don't like paying over $35 for eyeshadow but in this case it's worth the cost. Sometimes in life you get what you pay for. I plan on purchasing every pallatte available in this collection.

Personally it does not bother me enough to remove a star because if I do a double cleanse then I have noticed I donu2019t have that issue. Other than that, I think this is actually well worth it!

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m on the fence about this palette. I love that itu2019s a purple based palette with a touch of pink but I think some of the purple look really similar on the lid.  The more neon shades fade really fast even with their primer.  The formula is less creamy than usual but with less fallout. The packaging is beautiful but you can depot the shadows and take some with you. I feel like thereu2019s only 3 types of colour scheme that go on in there. The shimmers are pigmented but itu2019s not their creamy formula. The mattes are very pigmented since theyu2019re pressed pigments so they really will stain you pink , even the purpled stain pink/red. Itu2019s very heavy too. It feels luxurious. Certainly not a bad investment if purple is your jam but they need a sticky primer and time to blend , put the colour on tapping motions or itu2019ll spread and make a mess. I think itu2019s well done but I would have liked more variety but their thing is to make us buy each colour theme so itu2019s not happening.

reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with this palette, every shade in the palette is super vibrant when apply, easy to blend and layer on top each other. What you see in the pan will be the same when applied to the lid, except one shade A1 it is the only dud for me, it is a nice color but it is a dulI satin, I wish it is creamier in terms of texture, and shiner/add more micro glitters in it, then this palette will be A+++ in my books.  A1 is still usable can be use as a purply highlighter for fair to light skin tone, but may not be usable for mid to deeper skin tone I think it might look ashy. After giving the the shade multiple try, I suggest applying it to a sticky base with fingers to get the most punch out of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is amazing the pigmentation is everything! If you like colors in recommend you get this palette.

reviews.review_title: My First ABH Purchase...and I am in love.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first ABH product, and I was not disappointed! I've been a colorful eyeshadow enthusiast for years, and also very curious about the brand, but nothing truly caught my eye until this palette released. I'm extremely pleased with the quality of these eyeshadows and pressed pigments, as they show up beautifully on my warm, very brown skin tone without any issue. I found the product easy to work with, but for someone who is less experienced, some good tips would be: -Invest in a glitter primer if you've never worked with pressed glitters before (I use a $2 primer that works like a charm, so there's no need to break the bank there) -With the shades that are categorized as pressed pigments rather than eyeshadow, it's a good idea to use an eyeshadow primer (though not mandatory) and to tap on the product rather than sweep it on when you're applying it to prevent fallout.  Overall, this has become my go-to palette for both every day and theatrical (I do a lot of cosplay and fantasy makeup) looks! I liked it so much that I ended up buying Vol. 2 and 3 as well, and it was money well spent! I have every color I could want for creating a variety of looks, and the quality is outstanding.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to dip into this palette and donu2019t get me wrong all the colors are beautiful and amazing. But the purple shades actually stained my eyes... I was so disappointed in the product considering how amazing reviews and feedback I heard about. Donu2019t get me wrong I love Anastasia but this product stained my eyelids and definitely wasnu2019t for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know why I bought these... totally didn't need them. I bought all 3, why??? The colour layout gives me a headache and it's extremely annoying how much ABH is mass producing. I am seriously contemplating depotting all three of the Norvina palettes. I used to buy pretty much everything they sold... especially palettes, but when they come out with so many almost all at once, what the heck?!?!?. I do love ABH shadows and decided it would be nice to have every colour in the ABH formula. I'll be skipping over all the other newly released palettes from ABH. I haven't picked up any of the rapid fire collabs and don't plan on it. The formula for all 3 of these Norvina palettes are great, they are fun to play with so far.

reviews.review_title: Surprised How Much I Like This Palette

reviews.review_text: I am pleasantly surprised by how much I like this palette. When I saw it online, I wasnu2019t excited about the hodge lodge of colors but decided to try the palette because I love ABH and Norvinau2019s designs. I am so glad I did! The colors are beautiful I can create a lot of looks with this palette. The shadows have good payoff and little fallout.  I am deducting a star because I think the color layout is very unattractive. I get inspiration from palette layouts and a good one encourages me to try new color combos. This palette layout doesnu2019t. I am in the process of depotting and rearringing the shades.

If you enjoy color then buy this and youu2019ll be in love. The other palettes in this collection donu2019t really do it for me with the color story but this one is everything. By far my favorite palette.

The colors blend so well and are super pigmented. I just wish the palette had some light browns or tans for a transition color. Besides that, I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I opened the palette a shed a thug tear.  I am in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this palette. The minute I saw that this was full of pressed pigments I had to have it. I own a lot of ABH palettes but this by far is one of my favorites along with the Jackie Aina palette which I think pairs well with this palette not that it needs help I just find the shimmers are not as shimmery as I would like. Thatu2019s not much of a deal breaker for me. I did pick up the other two palettes and I canu2019t wait to get them. I had no staining. So far they work with my concealers I prime my eyes with and the abh primer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is way out of my comfort zone, never thought Iu2019d get this palette.. literally my top palettes to reach for are ND Biba, UD Naked og, pat mc grath, and Charlotte Tilbury icons, definitely all more of the subtle natural look side. I really wasnu2019t sure about this but I was so intrigued so I had to. Glad I did. These colors are so stunning. Theyu2019re very high fashion. I am the queen of smudging and rubbing off my makeup especially when itu2019s highly saturated or pigmented, happy to report that these palettes never budge. I always use an eye primer (less is more) before applying the shadows and a light misting of setting spray. This formula blends so well with such ease, better than the biba palette and that says a lot. In comparison to ABH 12 pan palettes this formula is not as powdery, but there is still some kick back but definitely not as much as some of those 12 pans.   I now own all three and I reach for them quite often. Definitely donu2019t reach for them when I want a natural easy look, but more for when I want to add a pop of color and go for a euphoria vibe.   I also love the shimmers in all three palettes, some are really packed with pigment and glitter while others are a wash of glitter making it easy for a cute subtle one color and some gloss out the door.

(Although I donu2019t mind staining as long as the product is good!)  Overall one of my best impulse makeup purchases

reviews.review_title: don't let the label scare you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When this arrived with the warning slip about not using half of the shadows around the eye area I was perturbed and nervous about using this palette. After some research I found that the main reason for that warning is that those pigments can stain skin. I decided to apply it over a good coat of white base primer both to keep the colors bright and provide a buffer. OMG, these are beautiful! They blend and build up well, the black and white are true black and white too. The colors do look a little different in person but they change upon application too so consider your skin tone as well. For reference, I have dyed pink hair, fair skin, and blue eyes, so these colors work especially well on me. I used setting spray and except for a tiny bit of smudging my look held up through 6 hours of partying, no irritation either. I'm not sure how much use I'll get out of the bright red or mustard yellow but this palette is great for creating bold, bright looks. It's not an every day use kind of palette but it's perfect for creating a bright, dramatic look.

reviews.review_title: This palette is not for everyone

reviews.review_text: This palette is a true pigment palette . Which for some could be issue . This palette needs to be treated like subculture palette in the sense of pigmentation ( which is a palette that I did enjoy) . It is a Pigment palette which a lot of the colors are not eye safe so keep that in mind . I have sensitive eyes and for me it didnu2019t cause issues.  I will keep using to see if that changes . It is a gorgeous Pigment palette and itu2019s great for people that like color or Perfect in pro artist kit . If you have any of the other Anastasia palettes you donu2019t need this one . I love color so I had to have it ( plus I didnu2019t get the others so it was perfect) .

You have amazing bright colours, gorgeous darker smokey shades, and some shades to create a neutral look - itu2019s perfect. Donu2019t let the fact that the palette is made in China fool you, this palette is just as good, if not better, than normal ABH palettes. Very little fallout, extremely pigmented and creamy, and they blend like a dream. Yes, most of these are pressed pigments so they can possibly cause some staining, but that is very normal for vegan formulas and thatu2019s the only reason it u201cisnu2019t safeu201d for the immediate eye area, itu2019s not going to actually harm you. If you have been debating about picking this up, just add it to your cart and checkout NOW. I have used this pretty much every day since it came out and I am LOVING it.

reviews.review_text: Wow, wow, wow. Iu2019m not one to collect or obsess over palettes, but when I saw the news about this release, I knew I really wanted it. It is absolutely gorgeous, the mirror is huge, and the palette stays open on its own without having to hold it at a certain angle. The shades are beautiful; I wish ABH would put them in some type of order that makes sense, but they are still great shades. I tried out several of the neon pinks first and they blended like a dream, but did stain my eyelids (I knew they would, they are BRIGHT). Iu2019m extremely impressed with how well they perform just with a dry brush - the pigment is super strong. I think $60 is a great value for this, and Iu2019m so excited to keep playing with this palette!
